item.title: Large Pothole affecting braking into roundabout, 15th February
item.description:
Pothole has been there for longer than 7 months. Drivers have to take avoiding action as the pothole is large enough to affect braking. Its right before the give way line at a roundabout so in bad conditions makes braking bad and avoiding action like changing lanes is absolutely necessary
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Byron Close, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Section of road floods when heavy rain, 14th February
item.description:
When it rains the section of road by the bus stop gets flooded and water does not drain away for hours causing motorists to splash water onto pavement and pedestrians. Please arrange to inspect when it rains especially when heavy rain. And install proper drainage system. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Yarnton Way, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 14th February
item.description:
This area reported , marked as “fixed” in an untrue as no one clears it . Reported by many for at least 2 months . This is happening all ver the estate . Nothing is being done despite claims it has. Is it ok for local authorities to lie?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Newmarsh Road, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Persistent depositing of food waste, 14th February
item.description:
Persistent depositing of food waste at top end of Balgowan Street SE18 on the odd numbers side. This is being done by a particular house on the even numbers side. It is not a one-off, but a longstanding issue and is attracting vermin in the form of foxes and rats. It is also giving others licence to fly tip unwanted items on that part of the street, as it is seen a dumping ground.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Balgowan Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 1 Randolph Street, 14th February
item.description:
2 street lights are not working in Randolph Street. One outside the Colonel Fawcett pub and one further along. This area is very dark at night and this is a safety issue that needs to be resolved asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Randolph Street, Kentish Town, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights are all out, 14th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Norwood Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London
